title: Tech Lead
bio: Language lover and AWS certification tutor specializing in AWS Developer Associate exam preparation. Helped over 150 students achieve certification. Provides mock interviews and hands-on coding sessions with real-world cloud computing examples.

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
bio: Senior DevOps Engineer with Fortune 500 experience specializing in CI/CD pipelines, Kubernetes, and cloud-native architectures. Provides hands-on infrastructure as code exercises and real-world automation scenarios.

title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
profession: Machine Learning & AWS ML Certification Training
bio: Senior ML Engineer specializing in AWS ML services like SageMaker, Comprehend, and Rekognition. Helped over 120 students achieve AWS ML Specialty certification. Provides hands-on ML deployment and deep learning exercises.

title: Cybersecurity Architect
bio: Microsoft-certified Cybersecurity Architect specializing in Zero Trust architecture, identity management, and cloud security. Provides hands-on labs and real-world enterprise security case studies.

title: Azure Solutions Architect
bio: Microsoft-certified Azure Solutions Architect and Developer specializing in Azure application development, serverless computing, and cloud-native solutions. Provides hands-on coding sessions and practical Azure exercises.

title: Data Engineer
bio: Certified Azure Data Engineer specializing in modern data warehousing, big data, and lakehouse architectures. Provides hands-on training with Synapse Analytics, Data Factory, Databricks, and Stream Analytics.
